sn35.247:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso arugatto pakkagatto saravanam paviseyya.
sn35.247:1.2: Tassa kusakantaka ceva pade vijjheyyum, sarapattani ca gattani vilekheyyum.
sn35.247:1.3: Evanhi so, bhikkhave, puriso bhiyyoso mattaya tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvediyetha.
sn35.247:1.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco bhikkhu gamagato va arannagato va labhati vattaram:
sn35.247:1.6: Tam kantakoti iti viditva samvaro ca asamvaro ca veditabbo.
sn35.247:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva piyarupe rupe adhimuccati, appiyarupe rupe byapajjati, anupatthitakayassati ca viharati parittacetaso.
sn35.247:2.3: Tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati, yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.247:2.8: manasa dhammam vinnaya piyarupe dhamme adhimuccati, appiyarupe dhamme byapajjati, anupatthitakayassati ca viharati parittacetaso,
sn35.247:2.9: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam nappajanati, yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.247:3.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso chappanake gahetva nanavisaye nanagocare dalhaya rajjuya bandheyya.
sn35.247:3.8: Dalhaya rajjuya bandhitva majjhe ganthim karitva ossajjeyya.
sn35.247:3.9: Atha kho, te, bhikkhave, chappanaka nanavisaya nanagocara sakam sakam gocaravisayam avincheyyum—
sn35.247:3.10: ahi avincheyya ‘vammikam pavekkhami’ti, susumaro avincheyya ‘udakam pavekkhami’ti, pakkhi avincheyya ‘akasam dessami’ti, kukkuro avincheyya ‘gamam pavekkhami’ti, singalo avincheyya ‘sivathikam pavekkhami’ti, makkato avincheyya ‘vanam pavekkhami’ti.
sn35.247:3.11: Yada kho te, bhikkhave, chappanaka jhatta assu kilanta, atha kho yo nesam panakanam balavataro assa tassa te anuvatteyyum, anuvidhayeyyum vasam gaccheyyum.
sn35.247:3.12: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kayagatasati abhavita abahulikata, tam cakkhu avinchati manapiyesu rupesu, amanapiya rupa patikula honti …pe…
sn35.247:3.13: mano avinchati manapiyesu dhammesu, amanapiya dhamma patikula honti.
sn35.247:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu cakkhuna rupam disva piyarupe rupe nadhimuccati, appiyarupe rupe na byapajjati, upatthitakayassati ca viharati appamanacetaso,
sn35.247:4.3: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati, yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti …pe…
sn35.247:4.5: manasa dhammam vinnaya piyarupe dhamme nadhimuccati, appiyarupe dhamme na byapajjati, upatthitakayassati ca viharati appamanacetaso,
sn35.247:4.6: tanca cetovimuttim pannavimuttim yathabhutam pajanati yatthassa te uppanna papaka akusala dhamma aparisesa nirujjhanti.
sn35.247:5.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, puriso chappanake gahetva nanavisaye nanagocare dalhaya rajjuya bandheyya.
sn35.247:5.8: Dalhaya rajjuya bandhitva dalhe khile va thambhe va upanibandheyya.
sn35.247:5.9: Atha kho te, bhikkhave, chappanaka nanavisaya nanagocara sakam sakam gocaravisayam avincheyyum—
sn35.247:5.10: ahi avincheyya ‘vammikam pavekkhami’ti, susumaro avincheyya ‘udakam pavekkhami’ti, pakkhi avincheyya ‘akasam dessami’ti, kukkuro avincheyya ‘gamam pavekkhami’ti, singalo avincheyya ‘sivathikam pavekkhami’ti, makkato avincheyya ‘vanam pavekkhami’ti.
sn35.247:5.11: Yada kho te, bhikkhave, chappanaka jhatta assu kilanta, atha tameva khilam va thambham va upatittheyyum, upanisideyyum, upanipajjeyyum.
sn35.247:5.12: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yassa kassaci bhikkhuno kayagatasati bhavita bahulikata, tam cakkhu navinchati manapiyesu rupesu, amanapiya rupa nappatikula honti …pe… jivha navinchati manapiyesu rasesu …pe…
sn35.247:5.13: mano navinchati manapiyesu dhammesu, amanapiya dhamma nappatikula honti.
sn35.247:6.1: ‘Dalhe khile va thambhe va’ti kho, bhikkhave, kayagataya satiya etam adhivacanam.
sn35.247:6.3: ‘kayagata no sati bhavita bhavissati bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha’ti.
